name: FINAL MELHOR DE TODAS TUDO OK ATÉ UPAR 11 Pizzaria Santa Sensação 1 V COM ARRASTAR GOSTEI PQ PARECE QUE PEGA MAISTEM COR , ERA O 1 (DA ESQUERDA)
description: A complete and modern web application for Pizzaria Santa Sensação, featuring a full menu, a functional shopping cart, a real-time admin panel, and a seamless ordering process via WhatsApp. Built with React and Tailwind CSS for a beautiful, responsive user experience.
